Title: Windows forms generator
Description: Windows Forms Generator is a class library to generate Windows Forms from a class. It will check all properties in a class and then create all controls for you.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Windows Forms Generator is a class library to generate Windows Forms from a class or value. It will check all public class properties and then create all controls for you.

For example int will generate a numericUpDown, string a textbox or List a listbox with add, edit and delete buttons.

A class example:

This class 

    class User
    {
        public int Id { get; set; }

        public string Name { get; set; }

        public int Age { get; set; }

        public bool Male { get; set; }

        public Stuff Stuff { get; set; }

        public List<User> UserListTest { get; set; }

        public string DesignTest { get; set; }

        public override string ToString()
        {
            return Name; 
        }
    }


will give you this form



Supported types:
  • int
  • string
  • double
  • float
  • long
  • decimal
  • short
  • bool
  • List<E>
  • Vector2
